name: Nioh Remastered: Complete Edition
summary:
Nioh Remastered: Complete Edition is an enhanced version of the action role-playing game Nioh, developed by Team Ninja and published by Koei Tecmo. Released in February 2021, this edition includes the base game along with all three DLC expansions:

- Dragon of the North: Adds new story content, regions, enemies, and gear centred around the warrior Date Masamune.
- Defiant Honor: Features new missions and a storyline focused on the siege of Osaka, introducing new characters and challenges.
- Bloodshed's End: Concludes the story of Nioh, adding further missions, enemies, and equipment.

The Remastered Complete Edition is optimised for next-gen consoles, offering improved graphics, faster load times, and support for 4K resolution and up to 120 FPS on compatible hardware.
